price: 21. Kaši ntango mabele ekobalusama na ndenge ya somo,
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
